thread.title: African states sign up to colossal trade bloc

title: African states sign up to colossal trade bloc
text:
African states sign up to colossal trade bloc Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:47 
Forty-four African nations have signed up to create a vast single market. But the two largest economies on the continent, Nigeria and South Africa, sat it out, potentially weakening the impact. Reuters' Duncan Miriri reports from Kigali.
